tooltip.fabled.wither_handle: A handle that's pulsing with ancient powers
tooltip.fabled.entropys_edge.quote: "They say the Void crushed the stars into this jagged form. It vibrates with a violent instability, held together not by steel, but by the gravitational pull of its own destruction."
tooltip.fabled.entropys_edge.line3: Deal explosive damage to surrounding enemies
tooltip.fabled.star_soul: "A Strange star....it keep on pulsing with energy."
